extendedInfo.description: Network with 1,500 of your peers. Choose from nearly 300 educational sessions on every media topic under the sun. Meet dozens and dozens of pros from NYC and beyond ? those whose names you already know and those you should. Tour their media orgs. Get critiques of your work and hands-on training in hardware, software, leadership and a plethora of medium-specific skillsets. Be inspired by examples of the best collegiate and professional media out there. Learn how to better do your job now and how to land a good one later. And win a few awards while you're at it. All in the media capital of the world at CMA?s NYC13, held March 9-12 at the Sheraton New York.Keywords: NYC13, CMA, college media, media convention, college media association
